kDesc

"I need your clothes, your boots and your motorcycle". The iconic look of The Terminator comes to PlayStation®Home with this full body outfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

"Je veux tes vêtements, tes bottes et ta moto". Le look emblématique du Terminator s'invite dans Playstation®Home avec ce costume intégral. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

„Ich brauche deine Kleidung, deine Stiefel und dein Motorrad.“ Der kultige Look des Terminators kommt mit diesem Ganzkörperoutfit auf PlayStation®Home. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

"Mi servono i tuoi vestiti, i tuoi stivali e la tua moto." L'iconico abbigliamento di Terminator arriva su PlayStation®Home con questo completo. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

“Necesito tu ropa, tus botas y tu motocicleta”. El aspecto icónico del Terminator llega a PlayStation®Home con este atuendo de cuerpo entero. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. 「お前の服、ブーツ、バイクをよこせ」 ターミネーターを象徴するアイコニックなアウトフィット一式がPlayStation®Homeに登場。\n\nTerminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

"네 옷과 부츠와 오토바이를 가져가겠다." 터미네이터 특유의 스타일이 이 전신 복장과 함께 PlayStation®Home에 소개됩니다. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
